This is our new friend Jan!
Jan started to work with Khora by the beginning of this year.
Like all of us he loves the freedom and speed on his bike as much as the wind in his hair. 
Aside of working as a courier Jan is a talented musician and artist. üßë‚Äçüé® 

With his nice bike and his fast legs he hits the streets of Neuk√∂lln and Kreuzberg to deliver you your favourite meal!

 #lockdown #fairfood #fooddelivery #bike #bikemessenger #collective #messlife #fairdelivery #couriercollective #foodie #food #delivery #berlin #fairfood #food #foodie

<Vivaldi plays in background üé∂> 
 
Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter
The cycle has come full circle 
Its all done and gone by now just like 2021 
Just like a bubble blowed in the air <pop> üí¢

We hope you enjoyed this little moment in the nostalgy poetry corner but frankly saying... Winter is actually still around and it doesn't look like it will say 'bye' anytime soon. üòÖ
And you know what? That's great, that's how it supposed to be. We should've be thankful because it means climate change didn't win just yet! üôå
Therefore in the name of Mother Earth we'd like to salut you for choosing a service that is environmental friendly over the stinky cars, that means a lot for us! üåéüíöüö≤
 
Yup - winter stays ‚ùÑÔ∏è but worry not, you can relax in your cosy place because we ain't going nowhere either! üòé
After two weeks of holidays our batteries are fully charged and ready to jump into the unknown reality of the year 2022 ü§©
Another four season , another four elements. Thats inherent part of this game.
Snow, Ice, wind, dust, sunhine, hot, mud, rain, and cold Again. Let us take care about it. üòº
 
See you very soon (2nd jan) and happy New Year! üéÜ

#khora #berlin #4seasons #messgame #foodie #collective #030 #newyear #neworder inspired by @juliett_brl ‚úåÔ∏è

Rare picture of Khora Collective in its full glory having last supper before x-mess holidays! üç∑‚ú®üçîüòπ

That's right, we're closing our platform from Monday 20th till Saturday 1st of january.

Last year's december we were working full on though. It quickly turned out that our lovely customers and partner restaurants like to actually take some time off. Therefore we're taking this lesson to heart and will try to experience a little bit of blessed laziness too. üòâ

We would like to thank you all for supporting us with any meaning: ordering from us, smiling while opening the door, tip, understanding that sometimes little errors happen to everybody and for spreading good word and believing in our hard work for a better change! Without you this wouldn't be possible and we hope that next year you will stay with us and our trusty customer's community will grow even bigger! ‚ù§Ô∏è

Also bigup for @maria.vegan_comfort_food who invited us for lovely vegan burgers, pommes and wine so we can celebrate in a family-like circle that we menaged another year. Thank You! üôå

So yeah keep in mind we're still out there delivering to you today, tomorrow and sunday; and then... see you next year (sun 2nd jan) and once again have a jolly good time! üéâüíö‚õÑ

Your Favourite Food Delivery Collective Khora

#foodie #delivery #messfam #berlin #030 #2022

It's getting colder isn't it? Food is good - we like food! Obviously...
But you know what's also good, especially this time of the year?
Yes, you read our mind* - it's Gl√ºhwein! Yeah pour it on!

Ah, snap! But xmass markets might not be set up just yet and well they're a bit crowded too‚Ä¶ Does it mean the party died before it even started?
No way, not on our watch! We've got you covered as always!

This time hand in hand with our new xberg located** partner @8greenbottles yey!
Dip into their selection of plenty fine products and find new favourite tipple or just order your usual pick.
You can trust these guys when it comes to wines - this lovely couple have been rocking the show since '17 and already have a base of loyal customers. Only difference is now you can get it delivered by us!

So chill down, open khora.berlin, order a bottle or two and stay warm! :)

#khora #hatecold #lovewine #berlin #foodie #couriers
*(how do you do this btw?) **we don't deliver from pberg shop sorri

Khora, the one and only self organised food delivery collective in town is onboarding new people! 

Wanna just ride some shifts, preferably on weekends? Or do you want to get involved also on the organisational side and be active member of the collective? We are open for both options! 
We organise from the bottom and build our own adventure!
Experience as a courier and/or in collectives is appreciated but not strictly necessary. Motivation is required tho üòâ

If you want to know more, or know someone who would fit, drop us a line on couriers(at)khora(dot)berlin.

*on similarly interesting profiles, FLINTA* candidates will be preferred

#collective #fooddelivery #messgame #gtaberlin

This new flyer soon to be found on your building front doors. 
We're not another start-up with money from investors to burn for ads.
Instead we use some romantic, oldfashioned, guerrilla methods. 
Wanna join us in revolution against big players? Spread the good word! ‚ù§Ô∏è

#khora #diy #collective #thankyou #seeyousoonerthanlater #redlightgo #030 #sincity #ordernow

üö®ONBOARDING CALL RESERVED TO FLINTA* PEOPLE (second round)üö® 

If you ever had to deal with the bike delivering scene and branch, you might also very possibly have noticed how much it is cis-male dominated. No need to list you here the reasons why that is deeply annoying and wrong. 
To eradicate such a strong rooted unbalance is absolutely not easy, and we are also pretty far away from reaching that goal. But covering distances is quite our thing! üòÅ 
Since winter is getting closer we are now looking for future collective members, interested in the self-organisation of our work such as in the delivering work itself. 
If you might be interested drop us a short presentation of yourself on couriers(at)khora(dot)berlin. If you know someone who might be interested, spread the word!

2022 is cold and dark but what did you expect in Berlin?
After a hard day of work everybody deserves some luxury. Manual labour, corpo, artistic bohema... you name it. Who even cooks these days?

Well, a bunch of kids on their crazy bikes risk their lives every day to make your dreams come true, so don't waste your time.
Order now!

#cyberpunk #foodiegang #messagefromthefuture

¬† 
luxury =¬†food and that we deliver it = no cooking necessary. we're there?

#messfam #diyordie #nevermind #akira #hereis #khoraberlin #babe
#yourfavourite

Getting food comfortably delivered at home or to your office without feeding corporate delivery companies? 

Finally you don't need to feel that bitter taste in the mouth as you click to order some food! Khora is self-organised, worker owned, reliable and fast. And yes, sexy as fuck! 

Download the app Coopcycle from your app store or order from our website (link in bio).

For those who don't know them, here are Max and Mattia. What do they have in common? Yes they both look cute but, they are more than that! They both push forward every day, keep Khora working organized and dedicate a lot of their time and energy to it. Ah! they are also two of the most obsessive dispatchers, if you hear the ring bell  earlier than expected or super punctual, it's not only because we like to pedal fast but also thanks to them ‚ù§ Give a extra like to our lovely friend Zora üê∂

#foodcollective #foodkollektiv #khoraberlin #khora #foodies #gastroberlin #fooddeliveryberlin #dispodisco

We work collectively, at eye level! In the plenary we talk about our structures and in working groups we take responsibility for different areas of work.
On the road we all ride our bikes passionately. Here is the proof: Flori <3

Look mom, no hands!
Badass Critters can not only deliver big backpacks full of food for you, he also manages to drive hands-free, check the new orders and still follow the traffic with concentration.
You wonder why Berlin looks like a forest and a park?
We are doing some test drives to be able to deliver your food to parks soon. So not "only" to addresses, but also to coordinates. Stay updated!

-

Look mom, no hands!
Badass Critters kann nicht nur gro√üe Rucks√§cke voll Essen f√ºr Euch liefern, er schafft es auch freih√§ndig zu fahren, die neuen Auftr√§ge zu checken und trotzdem konzentriert dem Verkehr zu folgen.
Ihr fragt Euch warum Berlin so nach Wald und Park aussieht?
Wir machen gerade ein paar Testfahrten um euer Essen bald auch in Parks liefern zu k√∂nnen. Also nicht mehr "nur" an Adressen, sondern auch an Koordinaten. Stay updated!

See you soon, enjoy the sun!

This adventure we named Khora started to really develop during the first Covid-lockdown.
So online plenaries and long discussions on chat groups were our normality for a pretty long time.
Nevertheless working so hard on a common thing that is now so close to our hearts made us eager to get to know each other better. As pandemic circumstances allowed it, we started to gather around on bridges and in parks for some after work drinks and chats, but those often ended up in work related discussions.
For that reason a pretty big group of us recently decided to leave Berlin and Khora behind for a couple of days, and to relax and hangout together in some forest. Yes, it was great! Yes, we managed not to speak about work. And yes, we love each other more than ever! But also yes, now we are back in town, fully motivated to deliver your orders faster than you would imagine. So feel free to load our legs with some more kilometres, we‚Äôre more than happy to surf in the urban jungle for you!

#sun #lockdown #fairfood #fooddelivery #bike #bikemessenger #collective #messlife #fairdelivery #couriercollective #foodie #food #delivery #berlin #fairfood

Here you can see Mattia in the urban jungle. The sun is burning his back - but that's okay! So the food stays warm in any case!
Soon we will not only deliver to your home, but also to parks and spots of your choice. Stay tuned!

-

Bald liefern wir nicht nur zu euch nach hause, sondern auch in Parks und an Spots eurer Wahl. Stay tuned!

Today we introduce you one of the latest new entry in the Khora family: from Buenos Aires please welcome Juan.
Juan is currently detaining the title for the best presentation mail we ever received, and we received some hundreds. The kind of message that made us think ‚ÄúOk, you‚Äôre already part of the team!‚Äù. It is just a great feeling to receive a mail from somebody coming from another continent and thinking already that we have so much in common.
Ten years of experience of delivering stuff on two wheels, so it took very short to him to integrate in the team. He also got some natural talent in hanging out with a beer after work on some of Berlin bridges, which is something we evaluate really highly here at Khora.
Juan has also recently joined the Marketing team, so he will be soon one of the responsible people for your Instagram daily entertainment. In the meanwhile you can also check out his personal page (@del.ride ) where he collects portraits of messengers from all over the world. Or catch him shredding the streets, but good luck with keeping his pace ;)
Bienvenido! :*

Simon joined us just a bit more than a month ago. Passionate and professional video operator he was already family for some of us, and he fast became so also for the others. Taking a sick amount of shifts on the street, always being available for that extra mile, and entering super fast in the organisational side of Khora. With a particular focus on the internal structuring of the collective, which is at the moment one of the biggest challenges we are facing.
Some days ago he received a purposal to take part to an important production (no spoilers here, sorry!), which requires a full-time commitment for 6 weeks. In the end the reason why Khora exists is to follow dreams and just be happy. So all of the collective encouraged him to take part to the project, ensuring that we will wait for him, and hold his place with us. Note of the one writing: it was a pretty cool scene to witness.
Welcome, Simon, a small goodbye and a big see you soon!

#sun #lockdown #fairfood #fooddelivery #bike #bikemessenger #collective #messlife #fairdelivery #couriercollective #foodie #food #delivery #berlin #fair #solidarity #elevatorlife

"Because we truly believe, happy mother, happy baby." 
-Shanay and Tabea (Founders of @mamamuun.de )

We are proud that we delivered fresh and tasty food for young parents yesterday. If you want to be healthy and treat yourselve nice during motherhood, choose one of MamaMuuns carefully put together nutrients-dense food packages, create your very own healing bundle or grab some of theire delicious nourishing treats that will have you energised and craving for more.

#sun #lockdown #fairfood #fooddelivery #bike #bikemessenger #collective #messlife #fairdelivery #couriercollective #foodie #food #delivery #berlin #fair #solidarity #mommy #flowers #mother #omnium

If you know us, follow us or ordered from us, you might have noticed we are a bunch of sweaty and stinky couriers. This makes our knowledge about cranks and tires way beyond average, but unfortunately that is not enough to manage and develop a business. 
Fortunately Aly is here for that. Originally from Cairo, Aly is writing his Bachelor final work about reusable packaging for restaurants and food deliveries. One of the concept behind Khora is to turn ideas (and dreams) into truth and that is exactly what is happening. Thanks to Aly‚Äôs commitment we‚Äôre currently moving important steps forward in the direction of an even more sustainable delivery service. We won‚Äôt lie to you, this requires a lot of work, but we are definitely ready and motivated for that. 
Having already previous experience in the field, Aly is also extremely precious when some serious and professional touch is needed in order to organise the onboarding of new restaurants. And yes, if you were asking yourself, he is also a really fast and reliable courier, but this √ßa va sans dire ;-)

Foto: @islamashrafvisuals <3

Hello friends, this is James! James has already traveled around the entire world and has tried many different things. By foot and by bike, in the mountains and in the countryside. A few months ago he moved to beautiful, urban Berlin. Here he has been chasing his talent and passion, cycling. James is always in a good mood, flexible and bubbling over with ideas. In the heart and head he stays forever young! <3

Today we would like to present you our friends @mikkellerberlin and @hamra_berlin <3

Mikkeller is a Danish beer bar in Mitte with 24 taps and a fridge full of beer from all over the world. Hamra has been in and out of Mikkeller's kitchen since 2019, and their current hummus menu, along with a selection of beer by Mikkeller and other selected breweries, is available for delivery on Friday and Saturday evenings.

In 20 years, when the food delivery market will be entirely run by cooperatives, we might have a little Khora museum. Don‚Äôt be surprised if also a bottle of wine will be displayed there.
That‚Äôs the one Tatze drank before writing to some of us that Khora crew was about to get bigger.
It wouldn‚Äôt be such an incredibly brave decision, if Tatze wouldn‚Äôt be already running one of our favourite partner restaurants, organising an yearly DIY bike camp, sewing the sexiest bike caps, soon opening the next best kneipe in town (stay tuned!) and being involved in another couple hundred political activities.
Luckily some people‚Äôs day seem to last 36 hours instead of 24, and so here we are.
Badass courier from the very first shift, Tatze is also taking care of Khora‚Äôs design and marketing and giving a fundamental contribution to our development as a hierarchy-free collective. Keeping it stylish as fuck, no need to say it!
In Vino Veritas, all hail to that bottle!

Foto: @marvin.systermans ‚ù§

Say hello to Mattia!
Mattia started working with Khora in April 2020. 
100%
First he ordered as a customer, then shredded the streets, and finally rocked-launched his dipatching skillz for Khora. In the first lockdown he even did some dispo-marathons, means dispatching for 7 days 10h/day!!
Mattia is all-rounded, he keeps track of our moneyflow, jumps on the bike in need, dispatch as hell, and always has some visions how we can improve our collective. Meanwhile, there are hardly any people who know Khora's structure as well as he does.

Beside the Khora universe, Mattia is a gifted musician and has a hand for art and typo!
He tenderly takes care of the team, is always the first at plenaries, joins nearly every Feierabend beer with his lovely dog Zora - and besides this, he cooks the most delicious pasta <3

#fromwhereiride #outsideisfree #wymtm #bikelife #messlife #bike #collective #couriercollective #fairfood #fairdelivery #foodie #courier #dispodisco

Straight outta Berlin (which is less common than you would think round here), here is Anderson.
Many start to be bike couriers cause they are bored with other jobs and just want to ride a bike to make a living. But there is much more to do in a self-organised collective.
Anderson after just a couple of months at Khora is already doing it all, or at least a big part of it.
Dispatching, onboarding new couriers, acquiring restaurants, never missing a meeting, helping out with his mechanic skills to keep everybody's bike rolling smoothly. And obviously jumping with his own bike(s) on the streets, contributing to make Khoras the fastest (and hottest) foodies in town.
He is always taking care to create an environment where everybody feels welcome, respected and encouraged to give her*his contribution.
 All of that just because that is how it should be: From the couriers, for the couriers! 
And yes, also for our lovely lazy customers ;)

We would like to present one of our fantastic partner restaurants, @chezdang

The Dang siblings work hard to prepare delicious Southeast Asian delicacies, which we then deliver right to your doorstep.

Their grandparents were born in Laos, moved to Thailand, and then over to Berlin. 

This diversity is perfectly represented in their #homemade comfy food - made with #love based on their original family recipes. <3

---

Old but gold!

There was so much happening this summer. The first lockdown was a bit of a renaissance for us. New structures, new people, new tasks.

In August we had birthday and turned one year old. We celebrated this with our first self organized alleycat!
In winter we managed to rename our collective. That also feels a bit like a new start.

Here a big THANK YOU to everyone who accompanied us this summer. Without your passion and commitment, Khora wouldn't be what it is now. ‚ù§Ô∏è

___

Ihr Lieben,
Diesen Sommer ist super viel passiert. Der erste Lockdown war f√ºr uns eine kleine Renaissance. Neue Strukturen, neue Menschen, neue Aufgaben.

Im August sind wir ein Jahr alt geworden und haben das mit unserem ersten alleycat gefeiert!
Im Winter haben wir es dann geschafft uns umzubenennen. Auch das f√ºhlt sich ein bisschen na wie ein Neuanfang.

Hier ein gro√ües DANKE, an alle die uns diesen Sommer begleitet haben. Ohne euer Herzblut und Engagement w√§re Khora jetzt nicht das was es ist ‚ù§Ô∏è Bisous!!

Ode an Dana:

Wearing the coolest cap in town, Dana is one of the veterans of our collective.
She is a talented musician, a teacher, and a badass courier.
Relentlessly delivering from warmest summer days to the latest frozen nights, Dana is the one we can always count on if we suddenly need more people on the street. Or for that nasty last drop late in the evening, when everybody is already heading home.
And whenever a word of wiseness is needed, you will always get one from her. Often flavoured with some spicy sarcasm on top.
Being a self-organised collective requires a lot of hard-working ethic and sense of responsibility, and Dana got so much of both that they don‚Äôt even fit in her giant backpack.

Presenting Max, 
Aka the Swiss Jesus
Aka the Big Rider. 

Love brought Max to Berlin, from Bern through Leipzig.

He's a bike messenger by vocation and he dreams of another society. A society where social justice, democracy and solidarity are not only byproducts of profit. 

He doesn't dream about it but he works every day on it: delivering, dispatching, making acquisitions and customer support, organising meetings. For us. With us.

Next time you ask your followers to #supportyourlocals promoting @wolt.deutschland think of Max and his dream.

Photo shoten by @marvin.systermans

#supportyourlocals #therealones #notgoldmansachs #notyourlocalraptorcapitalismaffiliate

Yesterday was the bike messengers appreciation day. The tradition started in 1991 in San Francisco when the mayor declared the 9.th of October the be a day of annual bike messenger recognition. In radio code 9/10 means "repeat". We keep on repeating what we love to do: deliver by bike. Kolyma2, our service, is founded on this passion.

This polaroid was taken one year ago, the 9.th October 2019, when we were still operating over Telegram & WhatsApp. The first order of that bike messenger appreciation day was for @anselmfahrtwind, one of the most dedicated messengers we know. We appreciated that. As we appreciated any single order that keep us alive.

Do what you love they say, the rest will  follow. We keep on trying.

#9/10 #bikemessengerappreciationday #onedaylater #keepontrying

Finneas, our youngest courier and biggest promise. The generation we're building our collective service for. Reclaim your city. The world is yours!

#upcycling #kolyma2

We are proud to announce that from the first of July we are operating as autonomus project from inside the cooperative @smart.coop. With shiny new terms and conditions and SMart's legal backup we continue our ride on a much solid terrain.

The great news about this cooperation is that any collective organised group of bike couriers in any German city with @coopcycle covering the IT side and SMart on the legal and accounting side will be able to start their food delivery service straight away with no capital at all!

The future is now: get involved!

Tonight a new star has been born. Ema managed to dispatch 50 orders flying. Flying dispatch means you deliver and dispatch at the same time. It was her first dispo day. ü¶ãüöÄ Not sure when the next courier messenger world championship @cmwc2020 in Bogota will take place, but when the day will come, she will be there and will rise her voice. ü¶äüèÜ In the middle, Mattia, our dispo master  and the backbone of our pop up collective. üêâüòª On the right our Guglielmo, top courier but  for tonight just Ema's boyfriend. He rocked the streets today with Dana, Erez, Dorian, Aga. ü¶Ñü§ô Shout out as always to Mex & @coopcycle that made all this possible! üî•‚ù§Ô∏è

Wirtschaft anders denken. Wirtschaft anders machen. Johanna ist eine Journalistin vom neuen deutschland, due nicht nur die Wirtschaft anders denkt, sondern sie auch anders macht. M√∂ge ihr Akt ungehorsamer Zivilcourage beim Pizzabestellen ein Vorbild f√ºr uns alle sein.

Johannas Pizza-Lieferung aus Villa di Wow war unsere letzte Bestellung vom ersten Open Beta Wochenende.

N√§chsten Freitag um 18 Uhr liefern wir wieder aus @moksa.restaurant, @villadiwow und @com.a.berlin √ºbers ganze Wochenende immer von 18 bis 21 Uhr. Switch zum Englisch:

2. Open Beta Weekend - Friday till Sunday - 6 pm to 9 pm. Drop ue a line! Get the magic link! Enjoy! 
It means: we're looking for beta customers to stress-testing the whole @coopcycle-kolyma2 system:: 18 customers for the whole weekend would be great to test the app on an higher flow. Get in contact with us! No matter where you live. We said only Kreuzberg area last week but we started delivering in Friedrichshain and ended up in Neuk√∂lln with Charlottenburg and Steglitz in between... Spontaneous beta customers are also welcome: just make sure, if you don't have the magic link, to drop us a line, and get one!

Setting up the @coopcycle space of Villa di Wow, our Italian New York style pizzeria, on Tuesday with Alessandro (and Beer). Tonight already online for the second round of our open beta weekend. Drop us a line, get the link, join the experience! #occupy #fooddelivery #lieferservice #besetzen #polaroid #600 #fotokotti

Our very first and happy beta customers <3 of our very first beta evening, powered by  @coopcycle . <3

Since everything went good and we had fun, we'll start tonight the first beta weekend 6 pm till 9 pm, in Kreuzberg* from @moksa.restaurant. 
The requirements to take part in this unique experience are: - be the lucky owner of a credit card - yes, we're working on other payment methods! - have at least 33 ‚Ç¨ left on your bank account - if not, call your friends maybe? - being in Kreuzberg - but our first delivery went to Friedrichshain: so just ask! 
You'll get: - the best nontraditional Indian food in town with an extra Naan. - a Polaroid, that you can share or hold for you in your secret Wunderkammer. - the possibility as a beta customer to shape together with us the food delivery platform you've ever dreamt of.

Drop a line! Get the link! Join the ultimative post-deliveroo experience. Tonight! 
PS. Special thanks to Mex (Coopcycle), David (@vidbina) and @fotokotti #fotokotti for the support!

The good thing about being closed is that we'll have more time to post the bunch of Polaroids we took.
